original: ZE_ACT_CHARACTER_RELIC
zh_trans: 角色扮演:遗迹

original: [Map] AFK teleport open in 50 seconds
zh_trans: [Map] 50秒后进行挂机传送

original: [Map] Zombie teleport open in 40 seconds
zh_trans: [Map] 僵尸传送将在40秒后开启

original: [Map] Human teleport open in 10 seconds
zh_trans: [Map] 人类传送点将在10秒后开启

original: [story] An unidentified virus strain is rapidly spreading across the world.
zh_trans: 一种不明病毒株正在全球迅速蔓延。

original: [story] Infectors will attack all alive and laughing uncontrollably.
zh_trans: 感染者会攻击所有活着的人，并无法控制地大笑。

original: [story] After disaster outbreak one week,almost all of the countries are in a state of anarchy.
zh_trans: 灾难爆发一周后，几乎所有国家都处于无政府状态。

original: [story] Survivor named it 'Crazy Disease'.
zh_trans: 幸存者将其命名为“疯狂病”。

original: [Map] Human have 30 seconds to ready
zh_trans: 人类有30秒时间进行准备

original: [story] 3:36 PM Forgotten Forest
zh_trans: 下午3点36分 遗忘森林

original: [Radio] ...(hiss)...This is Command Center...come in,over.
zh_trans: [无线电]……（嘶嘶声）……这里是指挥中心……请回话，完毕。

original: [Captain.Li] This is Alpha,we have arrived location nearly and we have contacted with part of Delta,over.
zh_trans: [李队长] 这里是阿尔法小队，我们已接近目的地，并且已经与部分德尔塔小队取得联系，完毕。

original: [Radio] More survivors have lost contact with us.It doesn't well.How about Dr.He and others.
zh_trans: [无线电] 更多的幸存者与我们失去了联系。情况不太好。何博士和其他人怎么样了？

original: [Captain.Li] Dr.He is ok.Team Alpha can still finish mission.
zh_trans: [李队长] 何博士没事。阿尔法小队仍然可以完成任务。

original: [Radio] Ok,Good luck to you...(hiss)...Detected infectors move to you...
zh_trans: [无线电]好的，祝你好运。。。（嘶嘶）。。。检测到感染者向你们移动。。。

original: [Map] Game and Zombie start in 10 seconds
zh_trans: 游戏和僵尸将在10秒后开始

original: [Dr.He] They are coming.It seems that this is the origin of the disaster.
zh_trans: 何博士：他们来了。看来这就是灾难的源头。

original: [Captain.Li] Let's go,we must find that crystal to finish all of this.
zh_trans: [李队长] 我们走吧，我们必须找到那个水晶来结束这一切。

original: [Map] Game start
zh_trans: 游戏开始

original: [Captain.Li] Doctor,you think that meteor is important of this?
zh_trans: [李队长] 博士，你认为那颗陨石与这个有关吗？

original: [Map] Be careful! ZM can across fire area but HM can not!
zh_trans: 小心！僵尸可以穿越火区，但人类不行！

original: [Map] Shoot barries to open road
zh_trans: 射击障碍物以打开道路。

original: [Map] Some ZM get speed up.Evolution ZM coming.
zh_trans: 一些僵尸加速了。进化的僵尸来了。

original: [Dr.He] Not sure,but in all probability.Before disaster outbreak we have received many messages.
zh_trans: [何博士] 不太确定，但很可能。在灾难爆发之前，我们收到了很多消息。

original: [Dr.He] In start of this we all ignore it and just think it is a riot.But soon almost all of area is out of control.
zh_trans: [何博士] 在这开始时，我们都忽视了它，只以为是骚乱。但很快几乎所有地区都失去了控制。

original: [Dr.He] Here is where the meteorite landed and disaster outbreak from here and in same time Crnobog go this relic build some facilities.
zh_trans: [何博士] 这里是陨石坠落的地方，灾难就是从这里爆发的。与此同时，Crnobog博士进入这个遗迹，建造了一些设施。

original: [Dr.He] So I think they Caused this.
zh_trans: [何博士] 所以我认为他们导致了这一切。

original: [Captain.Li] Ok,we have arrived relic,let's go to find truth!Damn,why these infectors can't killed?
zh_trans: [李队长] 好吧，我们已经到达遗迹，快去寻找真相！该死，这些感染者为什么杀不掉？

original: [Dr.He] Maybe he has known we arrive and these infectors are all reformed.
zh_trans: [何博士] 也许他已经知道我们来了，而这些感染者都是被改造过的。

original: [Map] Detected ZM you have failed
zh_trans: 检测到僵尸，你们失败了

original: [Map] A player picked Mortar.Are you gunner?
zh_trans: 一名玩家捡起了轻型迫击炮。你是轻炮兵吗？

original: [Map] The door will open in 30 seconds
zh_trans: 门将在30秒后开启

original: [Map] A player picked shotgun.It never gets old.
zh_trans: 一名玩家捡起了泵式霰弹枪。这永远不会过时。

original: [Map] The door open in 30 seconds
zh_trans: 门将在30秒后开启

original: [Map] Team Delta has been saved
zh_trans: 德尔塔小队已经被救援。

original: [Map] AFK teleport open in 15 seconds
zh_trans: 挂机传送将在15秒后开启

original: [Map] A player picked saw.Are you logger?
zh_trans: 一名玩家捡起了油锯。你是伐木工吗？

original: [Map] The door open in 20 seconds
zh_trans: 门将在20秒后开启

original: [Map] TowerGuard can press lever now
zh_trans: 哨塔守卫现在可以拉下拉杆了。

original: [Map] The door open in 25 seconds
zh_trans: 门将在25秒后开启

original: [Map] AFK teleport open in 10 seconds
zh_trans: 挂机传送将在10秒后

original: [Map] The door open in 15 seconds
zh_trans: 门将在15秒后开启

original: [Map] Elevator open in 10 seconds
zh_trans: 电梯10秒后启动

original: [Map] AFK teleport open in 20 seconds
zh_trans: 挂机传送将在20秒后

original: *** ZE_ACT_CHARACTER_RELIC ***
zh_trans: *** 角色扮演:遗迹 ***

original: *** Map By Ts ***
zh_trans: *** 地图作者：Ts ***

original: *** Because some reason,map just use 2k compile. ***
zh_trans: *** 某些原因地图只能2k编译 ***

original: *** Sorry to all player ***
zh_trans: *** 对不起所有玩家 ***

original: *** This maybe let you get a bad experience. ***
zh_trans: *** 这可能会让你有一个糟糕的体验。 ***

original: *** I will do my best to fix it. ***
zh_trans: *** 我会尽力修复。 ***

original: [Map] Nuke in 30 seconds
zh_trans: 30秒后核爆

zh_trans: 30秒后挂机玩家将会被传送

zh_trans: 僵尸将在10秒后传送

zh_trans: 人类10秒后传送

zh_trans: 5秒后开始游戏

original: [Map] DoorKeeper save in 7 seconds.
zh_trans: 守门者将在7秒后被救援。

original: [Map] Logger save in 7 seconds.
zh_trans: 伐木工将在7秒后被救援。

original: [Map] Firer save in 7 seconds.
zh_trans: 喷火工兵将在7秒后被救援。

original: [Map] Doctor save in 7 seconds.
zh_trans: 医生将在7秒后被救援。

original: [Map] Fireman has ready!The door open in 15 seconds.
zh_trans: 消防员已准备好！门将在15秒后打开。

original: [Map] Fourth floor main door open in 30 seconds.
zh_trans: 四楼大门将在30秒后打开。

original: [Map] Dynamiter save in 7 seconds.
zh_trans: 爆破手将在7秒后被救援。

original: [Map] Third floor main door open in 30 seconds
zh_trans: 三楼大门将在30秒后打开。

original: [Map] Magican save in 7 seconds
zh_trans: 遗迹法师将在7秒后被救援。

original: [Map] Second floor side door open in 5 seconds
zh_trans: 二楼侧门将在5秒后打开。

original: [Map] Second floor main door open in 30 seconds.
zh_trans: 二楼大门将在30秒后打开。

original: [Map] First floor first door open in 10 seconds
zh_trans: 一楼第一扇门将在10秒后打开

original: [Map] First floor second door open in 10 seconds
zh_trans: 一楼第二扇门将在10秒后打开

original: [Map] Main gate open in 15 seconds.
zh_trans: 大门将在15秒后开启

original: [Map] Veteran save in 5 seconds.
zh_trans: 老兵将在5秒后被救援

original: [Map] AFK TP in 15 seconds.
zh_trans: 15秒后挂机传送

original: [Map] Side door open in 10 seconds.
zh_trans: 侧门将在10秒后开启

original: [Map] Fireman has ready!The door open in 10 seconds.
zh_trans: 消防员已准备好！门将在10秒后打开。

original: [Map] Hall side door open in 20 seconds
zh_trans: 大厅侧门将在20秒后打开

original: [Map] Hall main door open in 20 seconds
zh_trans: 大厅主门将在20秒后打开。

original: [Map] Magic Room close in 10 seconds.
zh_trans: 魔法房间将在10秒后关闭。

original: [Map] Careful if human get a item,zombie also will get a item!
zh_trans: 小心，如果人类获得了物品，僵尸也会获得一个物品！

original: [Map] Now Magician has 30 second to choose open which room.
zh_trans: 现在遗迹法师有30秒的时间来选择打开哪个房间。

original: [Map] Mid hall side door open in 3 seconds.
zh_trans: 中厅侧门将在3秒后打开。

original: [Dr.He] Careful!We need to stop ZM touch this area 18 seconds.
zh_trans: [何博士] 小心！我们需要阻止僵尸触碰这个区域18秒。

original: [Dr.He] Or they will get high speed!
zh_trans: [何博士] 否则他们会获得更高的速度！

original: [Map] Mid hall high door close in 10 seconds.
zh_trans: 中厅高门将在10秒后关闭。

original: [Map] Mid hall low door open in 10 seconds.
zh_trans: 中厅低门将在10秒后打开。

original: [Map] ZM speed area has closed!
zh_trans: 僵尸加速区域已关闭！

original: [Dr.He] Careful!We need to stop ZM touch this area 22 seconds.
zh_trans: [何博士] 小心！我们需要阻止僵尸触碰这个区域22秒。

original: [Map] Bracket door open in 30 seconds.
zh_trans: 支架门将在30秒后打开。

original: [Map] Back hall door open in 20 seconds.
zh_trans: 后厅门将在20秒后打开。

original: [Dr.He] Careful!We need to stop ZM touch this area 15 seconds.
zh_trans: [何博士] 小心！我们需要阻止僵尸触碰这个区域15秒。

original: [Map] Fence break in seconds.
zh_trans: 围栏将在几秒钟内破裂。

original: [Map] Final door open in 15 seconds.
zh_trans: 最终大门将在15秒后打开。

original: [Map] Nuke in 45 seconds.
zh_trans: 45秒后核爆

original: [Map] Bridge break in 15 seconds.
zh_trans: 桥将在15秒后被摧毁。

original: [Map] HM get Ammo.In second floor ZM get HP.
zh_trans: 人类获得了弹药。在二楼僵尸获得了生命值。

original: [Map] Fireman save in 7 seconds.
zh_trans: 消防员将在7秒后被救援。

original: [Map] Fence break in 25 second.
zh_trans: 25秒后破坏栅栏。

original: [Map] Side Road Break in 20 second.
zh_trans: 20秒后破坏侧路

original: [Map] Fence break in 5 seconds.
zh_trans: 5秒后破坏栅栏。

original: [Map] ZM start in 5 seconds.
zh_trans: 僵尸将在 5 秒后开始

original: [Map] Magican unlock Ele and ZM Dark!
zh_trans: 遗迹法师解锁了人类电神器和僵尸黑洞

original: ** Because something,Final area light is terrible **
zh_trans: **因为某些原因，最终区域的光线很糟糕。**

original: [Map] Magican unlock NoZM and ZM Slow!
zh_trans: 遗迹法师解锁了人类防抓神器和僵尸减速

original: ** Sry to all player **
zh_trans: ** 向所有玩家致歉 **

original: [Map] Magican unlock Wind and ZM Warp!
zh_trans: 遗迹法师解锁了人类风神器和僵尸秒杀

original: [Map] Outside Door open in 40 seconds.
zh_trans: 外面的门将在 40 秒后打开

original: [Map] AFK TP in 20 seconds.
zh_trans: 20 秒后挂机传送

original: [Map] Team A has arrive in ready room.
zh_trans: A队已经到达准备室

original: [Map] And Team B road unlock.
zh_trans: 并且B队道路解锁

original: [Map] Team A Road Push Unlock in 17 seconds.
zh_trans: A队的推进道路将在 17 秒后解锁

original: [Map] In Here Team A player can go to Team B.
zh_trans: A队队员可以从这里前往B队所在区域

original: [Map] And now ZM will attack Team B.
zh_trans: 并且现在僵尸将攻击B队

original: [Map] Team A need in fast speed across the Hall.
zh_trans: A队需要快速穿过大厅

original: [Map] Team A need to close Boss room door.
zh_trans: A队需要关闭BOSS房间的门

original: [Map] Or ZM will in Boss Room.
zh_trans: 否则僵尸将会进入BOSS房间

original: [Map] Boss Fight in 10 seconds.
zh_trans: 10 秒后开始首领战

original: [Map] AFK TP in 9 seconds.
zh_trans: 挂机传送将在 9 秒后

original: [Captain.Li] Kill it to get sample!
zh_trans: [李队长] 杀了它获取样本！

original: [Map] Now all player have 30 seconds to ready.
[Map] AFK TP in 10 seconds.
[Captain.Li] We killed it!Let's go!
[Dr.He] Ok,and we have take sample.Now we must go to extraction point to leave here!
[Map] Now ZM attack Team A.
[Map] Team A need to break switch on the wall to open Team B road!
[Map] And Team B must defense sometime for Team A to break switch!
[Map] Team B need to break switch to open Team A road!
[Map] Nuke in 45 second.
